text: Honestly,we were only just passing by but saw what disgusted my whole family.This lady staff was initially digging her nose and wiping her finger on the countertop.Awhile later,she was standing at the shop front cutting her nails blatantly(not sure if she swept the floor later on or if the nails dropped on the floor).

Bought medicine for my kid. Paid full price for an item without member price as was in a rush. After paying, Noticed that there was 20% off for members. Asked the sales person about it and she said too late as i already paid full price. Maybe they can encourage us to sign up for member first since its free.

Staff lack knowledge on products. Ask for herbs to cook tonic soup, staff pointed to the whole shelf and said everything also can use to cook tonic soup. Furthermore it is more expensive than other shops
I’m astonished when the staff are annoyed when I can’t speak mandarin … this is an uncommon but increasing occurrence of discrimination
Thank you Uncle for efforts to refund me member discounts after payment processed! Worth commenting his professionalism.
